p: During the storage of meat, the pH value increased due to the breakdown of proteins. Use of EOs in the present study retarded the increment of pH which is in agreement with other studies [ 31, 32]. Karabagias et al. [ 28] indicated that lamb meat containing thyme EO (0.1%) had a slightly lower pH on day 9 of storage that shows the partial protective action of thyme EO against meat decomposition [ 28].
